{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03231v1", "title": "Weighted Eigenvalue Problem for a Class of Hessian Equations", "summary": "In this paper, we study the existence and uniqueness of solutions to the
weighted eigenvalue problem for $k$-Hessian equation. To achieve this, we
establish the uniform a priori estimates for gradient and second derivatives of
solutions to Hessian equation with weight $|x|^{2sk}$ on the right-hand-side.
We also prove that the eigenfunction is a minimizer of the corresponding
functional among all $k$-admissible functions vanishing on the boundary.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-06T06:47:06Z"}
